docs.title: LUMI-supercomputer.GitHub.io sites
docs.text:
These pages provide additional information not covered by the main LUMI web sites. However, your first (and official) source of information is

  • LUMI user documentation web site
  • Main LUMI web site

Subsites:

  • Training materials (oriented towards users, developers and local support organisations)
  • LUMI software library contains an overview of all software that is either pre-installed in the LUMI software stacks (those activated by the LUMI modules) or can be directly installed via EasyBuild
  • Technical documentation of the LUMI software stacks (oriented towards support organisations and third parties interested in how things are done on LUMI)
  • EasyBuild tutorials for LUMI:\
    • Tutorial prepared by K. Lust (LUST & University of Antwerpen) for LUST, CSC and local organisations (May 2022)
    • Tutorial prepared by K. Hoste and L. MArsella (CSCS) as introduction for LUST (spring 2021)
